_comment: POW TOKENOMICS TRACKER - PROJECT SUBMISSION TEMPLATE
Fill in all fields - use null for unknown values
Delete all lines starting with '_comment' before submitting
_comment_project: Lowercase, no spaces. Examples: bitcoin, kaspa, ethereum-pow
_comment_consensus: One of: PoW, PoS, Hybrid, DPoS
_comment_algorithm: Mining/consensus algorithm. Examples: SHA-256, Ethash, KHeavyHash, Scrypt
_comment_launch_type: One of: fair, premine, ico, private_sale, fair_with_suspicion
_comment_has_premine: true if ANY tokens allocated before public mining/staking

supply._comment_max_supply: Maximum possible supply. Use null if unlimited.
supply._comment_current_supply: Total mined/minted as of data collection date
supply._comment_pct_mined: Percentage of max supply already issued. (current/max)*100
supply._comment_emission_remaining: Tokens still to be emitted. max_supply - current_supply

emission._comment_current_block_reward: Current reward per block. Include any dev tax.
emission._comment_block_time_seconds: Average time between blocks in seconds

halving_schedule._comment_date: Use 'date' for past events, 'date_est' for future

emission._comment_halving_schedule: List all emission changes. Use [] if no halvings/adjustments.

_comment_premine: If has_premine=false, set to null. Otherwise use genesis_allocation below

mining._comment_hashrate: Use appropriate unit: th (terahash), gh (gigahash), mh (megahash), h (hash)
mining._comment_difficulty: Current network difficulty from block explorer
mining._comment_asic_resistant: true if designed to resist ASIC mining
mining._comment_dominant_hardware: Most common mining hardware. Use 'GPU', 'CPU', 'FPGA' if applicable

cost_to_mine_one_unit._comment_electricity: Cost of electricity to mine 1 token at current difficulty
cost_to_mine_one_unit._comment_total: Sum of all costs to produce 1 token

decentralization._comment_active_pools: Number of known active mining pools
decentralization._comment_largest: Name and % of single largest pool

market_data._comment_market: Get from CoinGecko, CMC, or DEX aggregators
market_data._comment_fdmc: Fully Diluted Market Cap: price * max_supply

data_sources._comment_sources: CRITICAL: Provide verifiable sources for all data

notes: Fair launch - no premine, ICO, or founder allocation
Satoshi mined ~1M BTC in first year but at same difficulty as everyone
_comment_notes: Important context, caveats, or controversies. Use [] if none
